amendatorysection.chaptername: Monopolies and Unlawful Restraint of Trade
amendatorysection.catchline: Cigarette tax division; powers vested by other laws.
amendatorysection.para: All of the powers vested in the division by the provisions of any law heretofore or hereafter to be enacted, shall be available to the division in the enforcement of the Unfair Cigarette Sales Act.
